meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rebecca Rider Brian Daner Tom Carroll Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6574.

td.p: Rebecca Rider, an office supply sales assistant from Fresh Meadows, New York
Brian Daner, a Congressional attorney from Washington, D.C.
Tom Carroll, a court officer lieutenant from White Plains, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $32,000)

tr.td: BASED ON THE COMIC BOOK
STATES THAT BORDER CANADA
DRINKS
FATHER FIGURES
ON THE MONEY
TREE HOMOPHONES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In May 2012 this band of superheroes had the biggest box-office weekend of all time with $207 mil. domestically')
